means: 可想到的，可相信的，可想像的，可能的

sentence.Network_en: Without their support the project would not have been conceivable.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果没有他们的支持，这个项目根本就不可想象。

sentence.Network_en: It is conceivable that I'll see her tomorrow.
There is no conceivable reason why there should be any difficulty.
sentence.Network_cn: 想不出有什么理由可以说明会遇到困难.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... conceive 想象；构想 conceivable 可想象的 perceive 知觉；发觉.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(29) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... conceivability 想得到 conceivable 可能的 conceivably 想得到地.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... conceit 自负;意念 conceivable 可想像的 conceive 构想;表达.
TPO_1-23学术听力词汇整理 - 豆丁网 ... evolutionary 进化的 conceivable 想得到的；可想象的 trajectory 轨道；轨迹；行径.

list.abs: ...conceived vt.构思,以为,持有;vi 怀孕,考虑,设想,常用过去分词conceive prejudices抱偏见convinced adj. 确信的,深信的;v. 说服
Baby panda dies 熊猫宝宝不幸夭折 ... revive 抢救，使复活 conceived naturally 自然受孕 chronicled avidly 热情的记载和报道.
compensate for 补偿，赔偿conceive of 设想，构思出-
To beget and conceive offspring ; reproduce ., 生育和孕育后代 ; 繁殖.

entry.tran: 可想到的;可想象的;可以相信的
entry.def: If something is conceivable, you can imagine it or believe it.

example.ex: Without their support the project would not have been conceivable...
example.tran: 如果没有他们的支持，这个项目根本就不可想象。

example.ex: It is just conceivable that a single survivor might be found...
example.tran: 或许能找到一个幸存者，这不是没有可能。

means.word_mean: 1. within the bounds of what may be conceived within the framework of nature;

auth_sentence.content: It's conceivable that its in use right now.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's conceivable that its in use right now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's conceivable that its in use right now.

auth_sentence.content: It's conceivable he had a horrible family life.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's conceivable he had a horrible family life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's conceivable he had a horrible family life.

auth_sentence.content: It is just conceivable that Duncan refused homage to Cnut.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is just conceivable that Duncan refused homage to Cnut.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is just conceivable that Duncan refused homage to Cnut.

stems_affixes.word_buile: conceive[v.想象;构想;怀孕]+able可以……的→adj.可想象的
receive[[v.接受;收到]]eive变体为cip+ent……的;人或物等→recipient接受的;接受者
con共同+ceit=ceive拿,抓,握住→[自以为]全部抓到→自大
receive[[v.接受;收到]]eive变体为cip+ent……的;人或物等→recipient接受的;接受者
con共同+ceive抓→大家一起抓[思想]→构想
de坏+ceive拿→拿坏的东西→欺骗
per全部+ceive抓→全部抓住→发觉
re回+ceive取→收到[回信]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
rely依赖+able能……的→reliable可靠的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的

means.word_mean: 可想到的, 可相信的, 可想像的

sentences.en: There is no conceivable reason why there should be any difficulty.
sentences.cn: 想不出有什么理由可以说明会遇到困难。

sentences.en: This sort of work would have been inconceivable before the advent of microprocessors.
sentences.cn: 在微处理机问世之前这种工作是难以想象的。

sentences.en: It is conceivable that there will be a new economic crisis throughout the world, but we hope it won’t happen.
sentences.cn: 人们相信一场新的经济危机可能再次席卷全球, 但是我们希望它不要发生。
